text: Yoder is an unincorporated community in Pleasant Township, Allen County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== The Yoder post office was established in 1934. Yoder, once known as Sheldon, was renamed by the railroad. ==Geography== Yoder is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Allen County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana Category:Fort Wayne, IN Metropolitan Statistical Area
title: Yoder, Indiana
